text: ولا تمش فى الارض مرحا انك لن تخرق الارض ولن تبلغ الجبال طولا

translations.translation: Do not strut arrogantly about the earth. You will certainly never split the earth apart nor will you ever rival the mountains in height.
And do not strut about the land with insolence: Surely you cannot cleave the earth, nor attain the height of mountains in stature.
(xiv) Do not strut about in the land arrogantly. Surely you cannot cleave the earth, nor reach the heights of the mountains in stature.
Do not walk proudly on the earth; your feet cannot tear apart the earth nor are you as tall as the mountains.
And do not walk haughtily on the earth; you can never split the earth, nor be as high as the hills.
And walk not on the earth with conceit and arrogance. Verily, you can neither rend nor penetrate the earth nor can you attain a stature like the mountains in height.
And do not go about in the land exultingly, for you cannot cut through the earth nor reach the mountains in height.
And walk not in the earth exultantly; certainly thou wilt never tear the earth open, nor attain the mountains in height.
And walk not in the earth exultant. Lo! thou canst not rend the earth, nor canst thou stretch to the height of the hills.
Do not walk proudly on the earth. You cannot cleave the earth, nor can you rival the mountains in height.
And walk thou not on the earth struttingly; verily thou wilt by no means rend the earth, nor canst thou attain to the mountains in stature.
Do not walk exultantly on the earth. Indeed, you will neither pierce the earth, nor reach the mountains in height.
Nor walk on the earth with insolence: for thou canst not rend the earth asunder, nor reach the mountains in height.
And walk not on the earth with conceit and arrogance. Verily, you can neither rend nor penetrate the earth, nor can you attain a stature like the mountains in height.
Do not walk proudly in the earth. Indeed, you will never tear open the earth, nor attain the height of mountains.
And do not walk proudly on earth. You can neither pierce the earth, nor can you match the mountains in height.
And do not walk upon the earth exultantly. Indeed, you will never tear the earth [apart], and you will never reach the mountains in height.

[17:37] And do not walk in the earth exultantly, that is, exultant with pride and conceit. Indeed you will not rend the earth, [you will not] pierce it and reach its depths with your pride, nor attain the mountains in height: the meaning is that you shall never attain such ends, so how can you be so arrogant?

(And walk not in the earth exultant) showing haughtiness and arrogance. (Lo! thou canst not rend the earth) by means of your arrogance, (nor canst thou stretch to the height of the hills) nor reach the height of the mountains.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّكَ لَن تَخْرِقَ ٱلأَرْضَ } معناه تَقْطَعُها بِعَظَمتِكَ { وَلَن تَبْلُغَ ٱلْجِبَالَ طُولاً } بِطولِكَ

translations.translation: And His saying, {You will not break through the earth}, its meaning is that you will not break it with your bone, {and you will not reach the mountains in length}, with your length.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
والتواضع والخشوع { مَرَحاً } ذا كبرٍ وخيلاٍ
 فكيف تختال وتتكبر أيها لمهان المخلوق من المهين { إِنَّكَ لَن تَخْرِقَ ٱلأَرْضَ } بشدة قولتك ووطأتك { وَلَن تَبْلُغَ ٱلْجِبَالَ } باستعلائك واستكبارك { طُولاً } [الإسراء: 37] أي: مدة متطاولة حتى تستعلي بها على من دونك؟! وبالجملة: لا تتكبر ولا تتجبر أيها العاجز الضعيف مع ضعفك
 وقصير عمرك

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: و { مَرَحًا }: مصدر في موضع الحال
